title: Voyageurs National Park: Pests
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Nature     Environmental Factors     Pests                Pests         A healthy branch and cone from a Jackpine. NPS  Forest Health The United States Forest Service (USFS) has developed a forest health advisory system to provide information about existing and predicted insect and disease conditions, identify tree species at risk, and raise awareness about forest health. Through a partnership with the National Park Service, the USFS has customized reports for each NPS unit. The most recent USFS Forest Health Advisory System Reports are now available. To directly view the Forest Health Report for Voyageurs. To view the Forest Health Reports for different parks.
